## AppBuilder.build() method

Build the application.

**Signature:**

```typescript
build(): App<State, Components>;
```
**Returns:**

[App](./dsl.app.md)<!-- -->&lt;State, Components&gt;

The built [App](./dsl.app.md) ready to run

## Exceptions

Error if no view function has been set

## Remarks

Finalizes the builder chain and creates an [App](./dsl.app.md) instance ready to run. This method must be called after setting a view function via [AppBuilder.view()](./dsl.appbuilder.view.md)<!-- -->.
